00010 #include "../GeneralInclude/CompilerSwitches.h"
00011 #include "../GeneralInclude/DebugSupport.h"
00012 #include "../GeneralInclude/ClassId.h"

00014 #include "../Base/CC_RootObject.h"
00015 #include "../Base/ModeManager.h"
00016 #include "PunctualActionListModeManager.h"
00017 
00018 PunctualActionListModeManager::PunctualActionListModeManager(void) {
00019     counter = 0;
00020         list = pNULL;
00021         listLength = pNULL;
00022     iterationListIndex = 0;
00023 }
00024 
00025 void PunctualActionListModeManager::allocateMemory(TD_Mode numberOfModes) {
00026     assert( numberOfModes > 0);
00027     assert( list == pNULL );
00028 
00029     list = new PunctualAction**[numberOfModes];
00030     for (TD_Mode i=0; i<numberOfModes; i++)
00031         list[i] = pNULL;
00032 
00033     listLength = new unsigned int[numberOfModes];
00034     for (TD_Mode i=0; i<numberOfModes; i++)
00035         listLength[i] = 0;
00036 }
00037 
00038 void PunctualActionListModeManager::setListLength(unsigned int n, unsigned int length) {
00039     assert( listLength != pNULL );
00040     assert( list != pNULL );
00041     assert( n<(unsigned int)getNumberOfModes() );
00042     assert( length>0 );
00043 
00044     listLength[n] = length;
00045     list[n] = new PunctualAction*[length];
00046     for (unsigned int i=0; i<length; i++)
00047         list[n][i] = pNULL;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void PunctualActionListModeManager::setListItem(unsigned int n, unsigned int pos, PunctualAction* pItem) {
00051     assert( n<(unsigned int)getNumberOfModes() );
00052     assert( listLength != pNULL );
00053     assert( listLength[n] > 0 );
00054     assert( pos<listLength[n] );
00055     assert( pItem != pNULL );
00056 
00057     if ( (pos<listLength[n]) && (n<(unsigned int)getNumberOfModes()) )
00058         list[n][pos] = pItem;
00059     else
00060         CC_RootObject::getEventRepository()->create(this,EVT_ILLEGAL_MM);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void PunctualActionListModeManager::first(void) {
00064     assert( isObjectConfigured() );
00065     counter = 0;
00066     iterationListIndex = getCurrentMode();
00067 }
00068 
00069 void PunctualActionListModeManager::next(void) {
00070     assert( isObjectConfigured() );
00071     counter++;
00072 }
00073 
00074 bool PunctualActionListModeManager::isIterationFinished(void) {
00075     assert( isObjectConfigured() );
00076     return( counter == listLength[iterationListIndex] );
00077 }
00078 
00079 PunctualAction* PunctualActionListModeManager::getIterationPunctualAction(void) {
00080     assert( isObjectConfigured() );
00081     if (counter>=listLength[iterationListIndex])
00082         counter = listLength[iterationListIndex]-1;
00083     return list[iterationListIndex][counter];
00084 }
00085 
00086 bool PunctualActionListModeManager::isObjectConfigured(void) {
00087     if (!PunctualActionModeManager::isObjectConfigured() || list==pNULL || listLength==pNULL)
00088         return NOT_CONFIGURED;
00089 
00090     for (TD_Mode i=0; i<getNumberOfModes(); i++) {
00091         if ( listLength[i] == pNULL )
00092             return NOT_CONFIGURED;
00093     }
00094 
00095     for (TD_Mode i=0; i<getNumberOfModes(); i++) {
00096         for (unsigned int j=0; j<listLength[i]; j++) {
00097             if ( list[i][j] == pNULL )
00098                 return NOT_CONFIGURED;
00099         }
00100     }
00101 
00102     return CONFIGURED;
00103 }
